General.Name: GMO Internet Inc
General.Description: GMO internet group, Inc. provides various Internet services worldwide. It offers Internet infrastructure services in the areas of domain, hosting, cloud, security, payments, e-commerce support, connection, website creation support, marketing support, community, app, and IoT. The company also provides online advertising and media services, such as media services, search, ad tech services, mobile marketing, O2O, and coupon/point services; and internet financial services, including internet securities, and FX and other trading services. In addition, it engages in cryptocurrency trading and mining business; and mobile, online, and other games. The company was formerly known as GMO Internet, Inc. and changed its name to GMO internet group, Inc. in September 2022. The company was incorporated in 1976 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
